channel.title: [RS2] Not a first, but basic

item.title: [RS2] Not a first, but basic
item.dc:creator: @Akuma Akuma
item.description:
@Akuma wrote:

Super basic Powerminer made a bit ago.

[code] program New;
{.include SRL.scar}

const rockcolor=4153993;//Color of the Rock on screen
const rockwait=5000;// Amount of time to wait for each mining attempt (1000=1 sec)
var loads:integer;

procedure PrintProgressReport;
begin
WriteLn(‘Progress Report for Retards Powerminer Miner’);
WriteLn(’ ‘);
WriteLn(‘Mined and Dropped ’ + inttostr(loads) + ’ loads.’);
WriteLn(’ ');
WriteLn(‘Made by Retard, Resident of Fagex’)
end;

procedure minero;
begin
repeat
findcolorspiral(x,y,rockcolor,3,3,515,336)
mmouse(x,y,3,3)
istextat2(9,9,‘Mine’,20)
mouse(x,y,2,2,false)
clicktext(‘Mine’,3,3,515,366)
wait(rockwait+random(1678))
until(invfull)
if (invfull = true) then
end;

procedure dropal;
begin
dropto(1,28);
end;

begin
DisguiseScar(‘Search Results - Microsoft Internet Explorer’)
repeat
minero;
dropal;
PrintProgressReport;
until(false)
end.[/code]

Add me at Retard@fagex.net

Read full topic
